C - Less than 50% motor function below level of injury but cannot move against gravity

E - All muscle, motor and sensory functions have returned

details.description:
Where need can be demonstrated, The Sargood Foundation will consider requests to sponsor a stay for those who face financial hardship, have a particular rehabilitation goal or who are otherwise in need of the services provided by Sargood on Collaroy. Available dates will be offered by The Sargood Foundation keeping your preference of dates in mind. You may be asked to demonstrate your financial hardship by supplying the following documents. This may include:

  • A copy of your tax returns showing your household income from the last financial year - a copy of your concession card - other evidence from Centrelink or Government body All financial assistance is granted at the discretion of the Sargood Foundation and available funding. Once we receive this Booking Request Form, Sargood on Collaroy will be in touch with you to notify you regarding the outcome of your application.

questions.question: Why are you applying for financial assistance? (please note that preference will be given to applicants that can demonstrate financial hardship)

Terms and Conditions

details.description:
The Sargood Foundation will be providing travel assistance grants of up to $500 to prospective guests who require financial assistance to travel to and from Sargood on Collaroy.

Eligibility:

The recipient will be selected from applicants at the discretion of Sargood on Collaroy Clinical team on behalf of the Sargood Foundation, based on the following criteria:

  • The needs of the applicant meet the primary purpose of Sargood on Collaroy, that is to support and promote access and inclusion for people with spinal cord injury
  • An Australian citizen or Permanent Resident
  • This grant is only payable to those not covered by icare or other agencies who will cover transport costs or to those who have received not significant financial compensation
  • Have not previously received any Sargood Foundation travel grant

The recipients of the grants will be selected from applicants at the discretion of the Sargood Foundation.

Financial Hardship Criteria:

As the intention of this grant is to provide benefit to those in need, applicants must please note:

  • Preference will be given to applicants that can demonstrate financial hardship
  • Applicants may be required to share on request supporting financial information that evidences that they do not have the financial capacity to self-fund this stay – such as tax return etc

Payment of Grant if your Application is Successful:

Payments will be given as reimbursement (not prior to your travel) and are dependant on presentation of relevant receipts as agreed on arrival at Sargood on Collaroy – Sargood on Collaroy will reimburse or organise direct payment of taxi’s if needed.

There is no roll over of unspent funds.

questions.question: After reading the above terms and conditions would you like to apply for a Travel Grant?

Approx. how much funding within $500 are you applying for and how will you be using it for your travel to and from Sargood on Collaroy?
If successful in your application, payments will not be provided in advance. Please tick the box showing you understand that payment will only be a reimbursement upon submission of receipts
